wikipedia_page.main: Jordan Luke Maguire-Drew (born 19 September 1997) is an English professional footballer who plays as a winger for National League club Grimsby Town.

response: *Jordan Maguire-Drew, professional footballer for Leyton Orient, was born in Crawley and played for local side Oakwood F.C. before joining Brighton and Hove Albion.
